metadata.dcterms:title: C13 N15 Stable Isotope Data for Cougars and Prey Species in West-central Alberta
metadata.dcterms:creator: Boyce, Mark
metadata.dcterms:description: C13 and N15 stable isotope data derived from cougars and their mammalian prey. Tissue samples collected between 2016-2018 in west-central Alberta.
metadata.dcterms:subject: Earth and Environmental Sciences
Cougar
Puma concolor
Stable Isotopes
